Yeah... Those kind of prophecies I can live without...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Roland the Last Gunslinger" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: So, what you're trying to say is that humans will cause a 
plague unto themselves? It's possible, but perhaps for our sake it'll 
actually happen a thousand years from now or so, if it's going to 
happen at all...
>

>   From: wingedwarrior41@h... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 6:00 PM
>   Subject: Re: Terrorist bombs-Everyone read

weapons? It 
>   might cause a plague too....

wrote:
